attributes.action: enpower the police to punish effectively the anti social elements of this society who are terrorising the law abiding majority.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We beleive that this country has descended into a politically correct quagmire. After dark the streets are ran by criminal youth elements who have no fear of the law. The silent majority have become afraid to leave their houses at night for fear of intimidation. We beleive that this is unacceptable and that non of the main political parties will tackle this problem. We beleive a radical transformation is required to rein in these unruly elements before the anti social youth of today become the criminal elements of tomorrow.
